title: Wheel Chair :- Chair used by disabled people for mobility
clause_text: Wheel Chair :- Chair used by disabled people for mobility. The standard size of wheel chair shall be taken as 1050 mm. x 750 mm.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
